question.string: What was the average aid committed per month in year 2010?
question.query: select (sum(xsd:decimal(?aid))/12) as ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?aid. ?obs lso:refYear ?year. filter(year(?year)=2010). } 134145226.833333333333333

question.string: What is the average yearly aid over the Finnfund channel?
How much money was given to strengthen civil society in Yemen?
question.query: select sum(xsd:decimal(?aid)) as ?result { ?obs lso:finland-aid-amount ?aid. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/15150>. ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ye>. } 180000

question.string: How much is committed in Ethiopia?

?obs lso:refYear ?result. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31182>. } order by desc(sum(xsd:decimal(?commitment))) limit 1 2007-01-01+01:00

question.string: When was the highest commitment for agricultural research and what was its amount?
question.query:
select ?date xsd:decimal(?commitment) as ?total_commitment { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:refDate ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/31182>. } order by desc(xsd:decimal(?commitment)) limit 1 2007-01-01+01:00 1080000

question.string: When was money committed for supporting state-tribe dialogue in Yemen?
question.query:
select ?date { ?obs a qb:Observation. ?obs qb:dataSet ls:finland-aid.
?obs lso:refDate ?date. ?obs lso:finland-aid-commitments ?commitment. ?obs lso:finland-aid-short-description-project-title "Supporting State-Tribe Dialogue in Yemen" . ?obs lso:finland-aid-recipient-country <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/recipient-country/ye>. filter(xsd:decimal(?commitment)>0). } 2010-01-01+01:00

question.string: In which years was the total amount given for medical services higher than that for basic nutrition?
question.query: select ?year { { select ?year sum(xsd:integer(?amount1)) as ?sum1 sum(xsd:integer(?amount2)) as ?sum2 { ?obs1 lso:refYear ?year. ?obs2 lso:refYear ?year. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12191>. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-sector <https://openspending.org/finland-aid/sector/12240>. ?obs1 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount1. ?obs2 lso:finland-aid-amount ?amount2. } group by ?year } filter(?sum1>?sum2). } 2008-01-01+01:00 2006-01-01+01:00 2010-01-01+01:00 2007-01-01+01:00 2009-01-01+01:00
